criteria: Identification and Location of Catholic and Protestant Regions in Europe
Explanation of the Impact on the Distribution of Religions in the New World
descriptions: Fails to identify or locate any Catholic or Protestant regions in Europe.
Identifies or locates only one or two regions, with significant inaccuracies.
Identifies and locates some of the major Catholic and Protestant regions in Europe, but with some inaccuracies or omissions.
Identifies and locates most of the major Catholic and Protestant regions in Europe with reasonable accuracy.
Accurately identifies and locates the major Catholic and Protestant regions in Europe, demonstrating a solid understanding of the religious divisions.
Accurately and comprehensively identifies and locates the major Catholic and Protestant regions in Europe, providing additional relevant details about the regions.
Does not explain how the division affected the distribution of religions in the New World.
Provides a vague or inaccurate explanation of the impact on the distribution of religions in the New World.
Explains the impact on the distribution of religions in the New World, but with limited detail or some inaccuracies.
Explains how the division affected the distribution of religions in the New World with reasonable accuracy and detail.
Clearly explains how the division in Europe affected the distribution of religions in the New World, providing relevant examples and demonstrating a good understanding of the connections.

Provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of how the division in Europe affected the distribution of religions in the New World, including nuanced details and demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of the historical context.
